SEARCH

Uses of Class
JEST.model.cards.Card

Packages that use Card
Package
Description
JEST.controller
This package contains all the classes linked to the game controllers and user interactions : GameController is the interface that defines all interactions between the game and the user. GUIController is the graphical implementation that handles all interactions through Swing components. PlayerRouter is a router that delegates player-specific operations to the appropriate controller based on each player's preferred interface (GUI or Console).
JEST.model
Core model package containing the business logic of the JEST game.
JEST.model.cards
This package contains all the classes linked to the cards in the game : A Card is a SuitCard or a JokerCard.
JEST.model.virtualPlayer
This package contains the three strategies possible for VirtualPlayer : We have the AgressiveStrategy, the DefensiveStrategy and the RandomStrategy.
JEST.view
This package contains all the classes linked to the graphical user interface of the game : MainWindow is the main window that manages the different panels and the game flow.
